file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 33-23-06-04 - DOOR-LATCH ENGAGE SWITCH - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL DOOR-LATCH ENGAGE SWITCH - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures for the removal/installation of the door-latch engage switch. B. The door-latch engage switch is installed in the toilet-compartment door striker and starts the lavatory OCCUPIED sign, the washbasin and cabinet lights, and the toilet ceiling lights (in the BRT mode) when you close the toilet door. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY DOOR-LATCH ENGAGE SWITCH - RE- ALL 33-23-06-000-801-A MOVAL DOOR-LATCH ENGAGE SWITCH - IN- ALL 33-23-06-400-801-A STALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 33-23-06 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-23-06-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. DOOR-LATCH ENGAGE SWITCH - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives procedures for the removal of the door-latch engage switch. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM SDS 24-60-00/1 C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 261 Toilet D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On the RH electrical-power control/distribution box (AMM SDS 24-60-00/1), open the LAVATORY circuit breaker and attach a DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to it (Location Tip: RB SERVBUS/LAVATORY). (2) On the circuit breaker panel, open the LIGHTS circuit breaker and attach a DO-NOT- CLOSE tag to it (Location Tip: DC BUS 1/LAVATORY/LIGHTS). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the screws (8). (2) Carefully pull the door striker (10). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-23-06 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (3) Remove the screws (9), nuts (6), and washers (7) that attach the door-latch engage switch (1) to the door striker (10). (4) Remove the nuts (2) and washers (3) and (4) that attach the terminal lugs (5) to the door-latch engage switch (1). (5) Remove the door-latch engage switch (1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-23-06 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Door-Latch Engage Switch - Removal/Installation Figure 401 A ZONE 261 B DET. A 1. DOOR-LATCH ENGAGE SWITCH 10. DOOR STRIKER 2. NUT (2) 3. WASHER (2) 4. WASHER (2) 9. SCREW (2) 5. TERMINAL LUG (2) 6. NUT (2) 7. WASHER (2) 8. SCREW (2) DET. B 145AMM330167.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-23-06 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-23-06-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. DOOR-LATCH ENGAGE SWITCH - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives procedures for the installation of the door-latch engage switch. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM SDS 24-60-00/1 PASSENGER WARNING SIGNS - OPERATIONAL AMM TASK 33-23-00-700-801-A/500 TEST AMM TASK 33-28-00-700-801-A/500 LAVATORY LIGHTS - OPERATIONAL TEST C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 261 Toilet D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Install the nuts (2) and washers (3) and (4) to connect the terminals lug (5) to the door- latch engage switch (1). (2) Install the screws (9), nuts (6), and washers (7) that attach the door-latch engage switch (1) to the extrusion (10). (3) Put the door striker (10) in its installation position. (4) Install the screws (8). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 33-23-06 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) On the RH electrical-power control/distribution box (AMM SDS 24-60-00/1), close the LAVATORY circuit breaker and remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from it (Location Tip: RB SERVBUS/LAVATORY). (2) On the circuit breaker panel, close the LIGHTS circuit breaker and remove the DO- NOT-CLOSE tag from it (Location Tip: DC BUS 1/LAVATORY/LIGHTS). (3) Do the Passenger-Warning Sign test ( AMM TASK 33-23-00-700-801-A/500) and Lavatory Lights test ( AMM TASK 33-28-00-700-801-A/500).
